sys:positions.title: Member of the Constituent Assembly for Palpa-3
President of Bammorcha's district committee for Palpa

description: Kul Prasad Nepal is a Nepalese politician affiliated with the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist-Leninist). In the April 2008 Constituent Assembly election, he won the seat for Palpa-3. His political career started in 1967, and he was incarcerated for three years due to his involvement in anti-Panchayat activities. A graduate in Political Science, he served as the president of Bammorcha's district committee for Palpa during the 1989 democratic movement and has been a member of the CPN-UML's district committee since 1991.
short_description: Nepalese politician, belonging to the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist-Leninist) and member of the Constituent Assembly.
